title: Ennamma Irukkadaa Lyrics Pon Ondru Kanden
stanzas:
Ennamma ennammaa irukkaadaa
moththama moththama kavuthaadaa
thangama thangama jolichaadaa
bodha kaadaa

konjamaa konjamaa sirichaadaa
bangamaa bangamaa mudichaadaa
engammaa polave azhagaa irukaadaa

ava nenappaa iruken thaviken
ava morachaa muliyaa mulikken
ava nadakkum vazhiyil thenamum
alaiyuren naanum

ava imaiyaa porakka thudikken
ava kanavaa kadatha nenaikken
atha nadathi mudippen koduppen
rasippen, thenam thenam thaanguveney

Ennamma ennammaa irukkaadaa
moththama moththama kavuthaadaa
thangama thangama jolichaadaa
bodha kaadaa

modhavaati puriyala perusaa
manasoda orasuraa dhinusaa
uyirellaam olappuraa kalakkuraa
pudhusaaga porantheney

alaiyaame veetukkula irundhum
palavaati kulikkuren thinamum
azhaga naan kolamburen kudhukkuren
unnaale

appappa oru paarvaiyathaan vachcha
kannukkulla niyabagama thachchaa
enna venummnu ennai kettaa
unna mattumthaan kaetpen

thappu onnu senju maatru vethanaiya
thaniye naan paakuren eppodhum
oruvaati nee vaadi seralaamadi

Ennamma ennammaa irukkaadaa
moththama moththama kavuthaadaa
thangama thangama jolichaadaa
bodha kaadaa

konjamaa konjamaa sirichaadaa
bangamaa bangamaa mudichaadaa
engammaa polave azhagaa irukaadaa
